name: Magical Dou-Shi Liu-Ting
description:
!! Only Chinese version now , English and Japanese are on-going !!

Slice-em-up game theme with Taiwan local culture .

Play as a newbie Dou-Shi , challenge Gods and get approval . Uncovering the  Mystery of grandfather's relic ! 

台灣式魔法少女，登場！砍倒所有的阻礙，突破神明們的考驗吧。與新手道士柳汀一起解開爺爺遺物的謎團。

Controls:

Mouse left drug to Slice (Main Weapon)

Right click to Special Attack (Limited but Powerful)

Press Esc in game stage to back to title. 

Graphics Tablets  are  strongly recommended (works well on Wacom Cintiq 16)

按住左鍵拖動揮砍

右鍵單擊使用特殊攻擊（有次數限制）

在關卡中按下Esc鍵可以強制跳出關卡

推薦使用繪圖板或是繪圖螢幕進行遊戲

Develop Team:

Magical Dou-Shi Liu-Ting  is developed by Heaven Tourism Bureau . Both members of this team are major in Interactive Design . This game our graduation design project . And full version will be released in 2019.

魔法道士柳汀是由天界觀光局所開發。我們的成員皆為互動設計專業的學生。這是我們的畢業製作，完整版本預計將於今年釋出。

Staff

Chin - Story , Coding , Translation

腳本、程式、翻譯

Chiuan - Character Design , Background Design , UI Design , Trailer , and anything about Art and Design 

人物設計、背景設計、ＵＩ、宣傳影片以及所有美術相關
